original_text:
In the womb he took his brother by the heel,
    and in his manhood he strove with God.
korean_text: 야곱은 모태에서 그의 형의 발뒤꿈치를 잡았고 또 힘으로는 하나님과 겨루되

sentences.original_text: In the womb he took his brother by the heel
sentences.korean_translation: 태 안에서 그는 그의 형의 발뒤꿈치를 잡았다.

sentences.original_text: in his manhood he strove with God.
